Title: Relates to the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages
Summary: Amends the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages; changes the time from Sunday from four ante meridiem to two ante meridiem; further changes the time from four ante meridiem to two ante meridiem on any other day but Sunday.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the sale of alcoholic beverages on certain days
